title: Learning self-advocacy skills for empowerment
content:
Scenario: Learning self-advocacy skills for empowerment
    Given Jordan wants to speak up for their needs and preferences
    And self-advocacy skills support autonomy and dignity
    When Jordan participates in self-advocacy training
    Then Jordan learns to identify and express their needs
    And the training uses accessible methods (visual aids, role-play, practice)
    And Jordan practices advocating in low-stakes situations
    And Jordan's advocacy voice grows stronger over time
    And support workers honor Jordan's self-advocacy
    And Jordan experiences empowerment through skill development
